name: Anine Bing Strawberry Sorbet Pout Preserve Hydrating Peptide Lip Treatment
about: What it is:u00a0An OLEHENRIKSEN x Anine Bing collab inspired by self-love: This sparkling lip treatment instantly plumps lip with hydration and smoothes fine lines, with lip-specific peptides and kokum butter...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns:u00a0Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Lip-specific peptides: Help makes lips look more defined and fuller..- Kokum and mango seed butter: Soothe, nourish and condition lips..- Cloudberry Oil: Provides intense moisture and helps soften lips..- Aci Sterols: Help strengthen the skin barrier and boost hydration...Shade Description:u00a0Pearlescent pink tint + sweet strawberry scent...What Else You Need to Know:u00a0This lip treatment visibly counteracts volume loss and restores bounce. The active formula is clinically tested to give you softer, bouncier, fuller-looking lips in just one week, with a mood-boosting pink glimmering finish and sweet strawberry scent...Clinical Results: In an 8-week clinical study on 39 people:.- u00a0 u00a097% agree it enhances the look of lips.-u00a0 u00a0u00a095% agree it rescues dry, flaky lips.-u00a0 u00a0u00a090% agree it gives lips a healthy bounce.-u00a0 u00a0u00a090% agree it leaves lips looking and feeling plumper.- u00a0 u00a090% agree it restores lip suppleness.
ingredients: -Lip-Specific Peptides: Help lips look fuller and more defined....Polybutene, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Cera Microcristallina/Microcrystalline Wax/Cire Microcristalline, Silica, Rubus Chamaemorus Seed Oil, Garcinia Indica Seed Butter, Euterpe Oleracea Sterols, Palmitoyl Hexapeptide-12, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Irvingia Gabonensis Kernel Butter, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Wax, Linoleic Acid, Linolenic Acid, Oleic Acid, Lactic Acid, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cera Carnauba/Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Cire De Carnauba, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Sorbitan Isostearate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Mica, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Octyldodecanol, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Dicalcium Phosphate, Tribehenin, Propylene Carbonate, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Sodium Saccharin, Parfum/Fragrance, Citral, Limonene, Linalool, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Red 28 Lake (Ci 45410), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Swipe onto lips for a fast boost of hydration that lasts..-Glow tip: Use after lip color for added shine...Precautions:.-For external use only. .-Use as directed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this color. Slight shimmer but is a u201cyouu2019re lip but betteru201d color. In love with the texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has got the perfect amount of moisture to keep my lips not dry and flaky this winter, plus this tint works perfectly with my dark brown lipliner to create a natural lip combo!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color and perfect amount of shimmer. Soothing on the lips.

reviews.review_title: Smells bad and has no taste
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just received this yesterday. Used some of my reward points to purchase the Anine Bing Strawberry Sorbet. I have to agree with another review that said it smelled bad. It smells like dirty musky socks and has no taste at all. I would return this, but I dont think I can since I use points. Summer Friday lip products are much better than this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells really nice and it has glitter which makes your lips look shiny. It also hydrates your lips, gets rid of those lines on your lips and its long lasting. Its a but pricey but worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Ole Henriksen lip treatment - I got this on a whim but it has blown my expectations out of the water. Iu2019ll be repurchasing this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not sticky very shiny long lasting great smell kinda high in price but totally worth it I want more

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this product! Iu2019ve always loved the Ole Henriksen lip treatment, but this one has just the right amount of sparkle without being too overpowering! Perfect for winter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Actually hydrates my lips but looks like gloss! I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a sucker for a lip gloss and this didnu2019t disappoint. I love the shimmer and the light berry scent. The product is a little thicker/stickier than I expected but itu2019s not waxy like another similar productu2026starts with a G and rhymes with dossier. It hydrates and looks great alone and with lipliner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this lip treatment for the past few weeks, I have to say not only is the packaging soo cute but it actually leaves my lips feeling moisturized!! Sometimes I put a little extra to make sure it stays because I find it absorbs really quickly. But other than that the strawberry sorbet tastes soo good and the glitter makes it so special!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: not my favourite, it was sticky and not very hydrating(i have extremely dry lips) but it did smell super yummy and the colour is pretty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry lips and this is soooo moisturizing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the shade of this and the feel on the lips, itu2019s really moisturizing and not sticky at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This color, formula, and overall product is a win! I cannot stop wearing it. It has the most beautiful sparkly shimmer without being glittery. It smells divine and goes on like a dream. Not sticky at all. I wear it am and pm. I already bought a backup and two other colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip treatment so much. I have the original one, the pink one and I love it. Always keeps my lips hydrated and natural. The shimmer in this is so pretty and very subtle not too much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ok, THIS is an amazing formula. Truthfully Iu2019ve only tried the Anna bing collab but I wear it everyday all day and especially at night. My lips have never been so soft and plump. I just stocked up during the BF sale. Iu2019m obsessed. The colour is sheer and although it has a glitter to it, it only looks shinieru2026.

reviews.review_title: Why does it smell like a musty towel?!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Did I get a bad tube? Because it smells like a musty towel and moldy strawberry!  I like the look and the color and all but ewuh. Should have tried to OG first

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Color and packaging are gorgeous. I love the color and the glimmer is subtle. However, Iu2019ve noticed it doesnu2019t last as long as the original formula. I chronic dry lips on the winter and this version just doesnu2019t cut it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite lip treatments! My first time purchasing OLEHENRIKSEN and this is amazing! Leaves my lips nice and soft, and the tint on this is pretty. I use this as my everyday go to- with a little bit of lip liner. Love love love!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: favourite lip products tbh; feels hydrating, applies nicely, and gets rid of all my lip lines!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a lot of lip glosses (Laneige, Summer Fridays, Fenty Glow to mention a few), and this one is my favorite. Itu2019s not sticky, and itu2019s thick without being too thick. Super moisturizing. A must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have the other Ole Henriksen lip treatments (the og and bought the blood orange spritz twice) and love the formula. I saw this and loved the idea of a shimmer version. Unfortunately, I feel like it is not as good as the original formula. It left my lips chapped and not as long lasting. I will stick to the OG formulas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizing lip balm! Not only is the color super vibrant, but it keeps my lips so hydrated during the cold winter months. I love the price of the item as itu2019s also very affordable. Doesnu2019t dry out either

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! Wore it to work a couple times to see how long it would last. It lasts a good 2-3 hours and it is very hydrating. Definitely doesnu2019t get the hype it deserves.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sooo pretty and I canu2019t feel any grittiness or anything but given that there are sparkles in it! It feels exactly like the OG pout preserve, and the shade is so pretty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a good lip treatment. I have it in almost every color and this one is just as great as the others. This one smells so good, has a great texture that makes your lips feel moisturized and the sparkle makes it  so cute!! So glad I got this in the sale.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! Itu2019s a flattering color and leaves lips moist and not overwhelming!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely not my favorite of the shades, as it doesn't quite show up on my lips as advertised. A nice product for the exclusivity, but I would just stick with the original shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ordered during the Sephora sale, Iu2019ve been a  loyal summer Fridayu2019s fan and heard  great things about this lip balm, 100% did not disappoint. Would recommend to anyone, so hydrating and the perfect glossy shade

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First time trying to Ole lip treatment and I really enjoy it. Cushion-y feeling. Has a smell and sweet taste that I enjoy. Very sheer sheen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OBSESSED!!! Olehenriksen needs to make this permanent. The scent is incredible and itu2019s so moisturizing and it makes my lips look incredible!

reviews.review_title: Finally my dry irritated lips are gone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my new lip products irritated and dried out my lips. Never had this issue before. It felt like I had an extra layer of skin on my upper lip. It was either my eggnog mask or a lip plumper from Favorites kit or both.  I would use my usual lip balms, and after a couple of hours, gloss was gone and my lips were dry especially at night. So relieved and glad I tried this. It lasts overnight and my lips are rehydrated. Switching over to this and will be buying more. Plush gloss with shimmer and subtle scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A must have! Super hydrating and long lasting and such a beautiful glossy shine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this addition to the OH Pout Preserve family. Itu2019s a lovely flavor, and the color and glimmer are a fun addition for the holidays!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this is the most plush lip balm on the market right now that actually hydrates your lips! way better than summer fridays. this shade specifically is so beautiful and glossy, it replaces the need for any lip gloss. the sparkle in this is not tacky

reviews.review_title: Like a Pillow on My Lips
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is the best thing to have ever touched my lips. Not only is the color absolutely gorgeous, it literally feels like a pillow on my lips. So much better that my high end lips oils. We definitely be purchasing more!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this out because i love both brands. Unfortunately I dislike the scent/taste. It reminds me of lip smackers. Leaves a artificial taste when compared to the citrus or the cocoa that are my go to!

reviews.review_title: The Original flavor is much better
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love this but found it smelled too artificially sweet and has gold glitter in it. Exchanged for the OG yellow one which is unbeatable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved it so much I bought two since itu2019s limited edition and I am obsessed with all things Anine Bing! Itu2019s the most beautiful light shimmer lip treatment that looks like a gloss. I actually use it as a lip gloss on top of my liners. It goes well with my nudes, browns and pinks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: OK, OK I get the hype!  Finally bought one of these and itu2019s A+.  Thick but soft and very hydrating.  I love the nude/pink shimmer of the Anine Bing one. I could do without the strawberry scent but itu2019s very subtle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Summer Fridays is still my holy grail!!! Iu2019m giving it 4 stars because this gloss clung to the dryer spots on my lips and didnu2019t have the smoothest appearance. Whereas the SF never has that issue. nice smell & color though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a subtle shine and glitter on my darker lips, but itu2019s absolutely beautiful. You can use this as a topper or on its own. It smells really good and the applicator is perfect for smoothing out the product everywhere.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this! This is the first lip balm Iu2019ve tried from this brand, I want the pomegranate fizz so badud83dudc94ud83dudc94 this smells like baby lips lip balm from when i was a kid. It isnu2019t so bad that iu2019d return it, iu2019m going to keep this! Itu2019s a thick texture, If you only apply a little bit i do feel like thereu2019s a chance you could feel the glitter. onl

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The shimmer is so pretty. Leaves my lips feeling so hydrated. I wish it wasnu2019t limited edition!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells just like the regular strawberry sorbet pour preserve. Shimmery and so pretty and lasts as long as the original imo. I love the cute packaging too! Itu2019s simple but girly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful sparkle and soft on lips. Does not last as long as the non glitter flavors but still cute!
